sources.title: 1937 Man Spricht Über Jacqueline ( Albrecht Schönhals, Sabine Peters, Fritz Genschow)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1937 Man spricht über Jaqueline  u.a mit Albrecht Schönhals,Sabine Peters und Fritz Genschow

metadata.Plot: Since her father died, rich and carefree Jacqueline Topelius makes magazine covers and causes social gossip with her flirtatious adventures around Europe, leaving a string of admirers behind without much concern. Her sister June, living in Paris, is all the contrary but they love each other just the same. Everything changes when Jacqueline meets Dr. Michael Thomas, who rejects her at first. Now she must choose, and also face the consequences her past life may have on their future together.
metadata.Writer: Katrin Holland, Friedrich Dammann, Werner Hochbaum
metadata.Actors: Wera Engels, Albrecht Schoenhals, Sabine Peters
